message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're confident it's worth more than $80 to you. Considering its true worth and your potential satisfaction, I propose a fair price of $120 for the product. This offer not only ensures you receive a valuable item but also allows us to fairly compensate for our efforts and costs. Please let me know if this works for you.
